features: Widely Used: The mini broom and dustpan can clean small areas of keyboards, tables, and countertops. It can also clean the nests of various small animals, such as cats, dogs, hamsters, rabbits, guinea pigs, etc.

Funny Design： Mini dustpan with cute moustache design on it. The broom handle can slide into the dust collection tray handle, with a compact structure. In addition, both the small broom and dustpan are designed with hanging holes for convenient storage
High Quality: The hand brush and dustpan set are made of PP material, The Handle length is 5.86 in, so it can easily enter the corners and solve cleaning problems.

Flexible & Practical：The handle is easy to grip and the bristles are soft, suitable for cleaning small debris in small areas. Note: The bristles belong to the soft series and are suitable for cleaning light and small items.

Quality Guarantee: If your dustpan lip or dustpan bristles are bent, please contact us through the path: "Customer service - order history - contact seller - DGiant Dragon", and we will give you a satisfactory reply the first time.
body.description: The mini broom and dustpan set can effectively help you clean gaps and small areas of clutter, and the compact and portable dustpan is convenient to use both indoors and outdoors. 1. Nested stacking 2. Compact & portable 3. Hanging ring at the top of the handle 4. The groove of the dustpan prevents overflow 5. Perfect for desktops, tables, offices, work areas, camping and more

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars its great, although more compact than I thought, and not solid white
reviews.reviewText: I would technically give this like 4.5, as it is smaller than I thought, and not solid white, as I thought. (solid white would match my bathroom the best.) But its still really great. So size wise its not like a normal sized dustpan, but the smaller size, about the width of my cellphone at the opening, or about 6.5 inches. This can be good or bad, as ofc it will collect less stuff at once, but will also be more compact, and better to fit in small space, and you can put it pretty much wherever. So I guess I even like it more compact as it fits the smaller space of my bathroom, where I will be using it. And the color is not a big deal either, as its like a tan, off-white color, but definitely not solid white. From the photos you really can't tell its not white as it looks darker than in those photos. But again, it still looks good, and its like a greyish off-white.Mainly: it looks funny which I very much like, and it works well...so I am very happy with it. The brush is strong and moves bathroom dust and hair really really easily, and the base part is sturdy. The handle also "clicks" into the base part easily, so you can keep it together easily. Also as a silly bonus...you can move the handle in the groove up and down by an inch or two...thus changing the "length" of his nose.......quite a silly bit of personal entertainment...but another fun thing you can do with it.So it works well...and adds some silly humor to my bathroom. Love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute Mini Broom and Dustpan Set
reviews.reviewText: This dustpan set is very small. It measures 5 inches at the bottom of the dustpan. The handle is less than 6 inches. For easy storage, the broom handle slides into the dustpan handle. There is a hole at the top, so this can be hung up. The bristles are very soft and they measure 1 to 1 ¼ inches. The broom will only handle lightweight and small items. This set can easily solve small cleaning problems that larger dustpans cannot get to. It has a cute mustache design on it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have tried to find a little broom like this for my bedroom and misc spots around the house. I always have cracker crumbs from the kid everywhere. I don't like the larger ones because I just need a little one. This looked so cute in the pictures and I was very happy when it arrived to see the details. It has a little nose and all I did not notice immediately. It works on the areas I need it to as I already used it a few times.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Super cute and handy little broom. The dustpan is snug on the broom so you don't loose it. Good little set.
